episodes.synopsis: When María dreams about four flowers, a sign of true love, she associates them with the thief on the metro who had four flowers on his shirt.
episodes.title: Sueno angelical

episodes.synopsis: María prays to be told who the man of her dreams is; it's Albertano, who she saves from an accident. But unfortunately he's Doña Lucha's son.
episodes.title: El perro de los focos

episodes.synopsis: María wants a simple life with Albertano. Carmelo gets locked in trying out the security system. War breaks out between mother and daughter-in-law.
episodes.title: Los chiles de la discordia

episodes.synopsis: María gets a vote of good faith and recalls the tragedy of her 15th birthday. While Carmelo's business is shut down, Lucha opens one of his own.
episodes.title: San chambelan

episodes.synopsis: When Ofertín has problems at the store, María dreams about him and the angels. Albertano accepts the job and Ofertín goes out with the trash.
episodes.title: Sostengo el pi

episodes.synopsis: Chino is having a party at home, but doesn't invite Nayeli; she shows up anyway. At the store, Delfino is the new advertising director.
episodes.title: Ofertin y los vinagres basalticos

episodes.synopsis: María secretly irons Albertano's work clothes. Jealous, Lucha wants to ruin his uniform and make him lose his job, but then has second thoughts.
episodes.title: Los juniors de satelite

episodes.synopsis: María becomes jealous when Vanesa flirts with Albertano, but keeps cool and plans a surprise dinner. Doña Lucha organizes a lottery.
episodes.title: Carnes frias

episodes.synopsis: Chino blackmails Albertano because María irons his clothes, but Lucha gets wind of it. Rosa finds him a job, but he does it all wrong.
episodes.title: Placentex antiesponge

episodes.synopsis: María, Chino and Albertano visit the museum. When they get kicked out, María and Albertano go to Chapultepec where she declares her love for him.
episodes.title: Domingo en chapultepec

episodes.synopsis: It's the Chivas America game and Lucha has organized a lottery at her house. María wins Albertano over.
episodes.title: La noche de la langosta

episodes.synopsis: When Doña Juana's cat wreaks havoc, the neighbors are up in arms. When the cat later turns up dead, Doña Lucha and Chino want to make it disappear.
episodes.title: El rap de Dona Juana

episodes.synopsis: María and Albertano wash the water tank and Chino finds out. Meanwhile, Doña Lucha doesn't realize that María was left inside the water tank.
episodes.title: Una luz al fondo del tinaco

video.title: Maria de todos los Angeles
video.synopsis: Maria dreams of finding the love of her life and asks the angels for help. They respond by giving her clues in her dreams to find Albertano.
